UDM Tool for WFM (UKG Dimensions)

***** THIS IS NOT AN OFFICIAL UKG PRODUCT*****

General Use
     •	Automatic Forgerock credential login in WFM.
     •	Automatically provides a 'Reason' when logging into WFM.
     •	Automatically open commonly used WFM pages. 
     •	WFM tenant bookmark creation.
     •	Automatically open your personal WFM instance after logging into Pro for recording time if you are an hourly employee clocking in/out.
